Massachusetts has seen a 48%  spike in anti-Semitic incidents over the last year. Including just a few days ago in Peabody. 

We cannot tolerate this at any level. I join my colleagues in condemning anti-semitism in our communities. https://t.co/wz4ym4DDHx

The #GIRestorationBill could fix this going forward for the families of those veterans.

78 years ago to the day, brave American troops ran head-on into the gravest of danger to defend the free world from evil.

Each #DDay anniversary serves reminds us that democracy can't be taken for granted. We need to put in the work to preserve it every day. https://t.co/XuXm2bsdnL

June is #PrideMonth . Team Moulton marked the occasion by raising the Pride flag with the City of #Salem. 

This month (and every month) we celebrate, appreciate, and elevate LGBTQIA+ voices within our community and across the globe. https://t.co/DzMDXigNsv
